title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Blue Lake, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Owen Woodward, “Some beautiful goats were very curious about my bike! it was magical! Blue Lake, Colorado.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Blue Lake, Colorado appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
